Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals. To the south you can make out a road heading towards Arkham.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A rough trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a rough and ragged trail. Kicking up a rock or two as you walk you notice exactly how barren this trail actually is. No plants along the side, no trees for atleast 50 or so paces on each side, no animals.

Room.Name: A clearing
Room.Description: This clearing seems to have been made by some unnatural force. Trees cut down and no grass or plantlife of any kind. A strange smell wafts in from the north. Looking closer you think you can make out tents and a large fortress of some type. There is a rough trail to the south.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. There is a tent to the west.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. There is a tent to the west.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. There is a tent to the east.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. There is a tent to the north.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. There is a tent to the east.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. To the north you see a large fortress.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way.

Room.Name: A dark encampment
Room.Description: The encampment is small at first glance, but when you see how efficiently the Obsidian soldiers handle their space you see it is no problem for them. The ground is somewhat muddy from recent rain and the smell of something strange wafts your way. You see a hill leading down.

Room.Name: At the Bottom of the Hill
Room.Description: At the bottom of this hill you can see many things that the soldiers have discarded here. Bodies, for one thing. You also see a sharp piece of dark obsidian jutting out of the hill. You see no way to pull or push to break it free, and it seems to hum with life and magical power.

Room.Name: Before the Obsidian Fortress
Room.Description: The fortress itself is made completely of obsidian, giving the impression it was forged from one solid piece. The outer gates are laced with mithril and quite possibly the largest you have ever seen. On the front of the door there is a crest of the Obsidian Order. You notice that the outer walls of this fortress seem to hum softly.

Room.Name: Entrance way
Room.Description: This large room serves as an entrance way to the fortress. The room itself is quite large and the chandelier in the center of the ceiling illumates it quite well. To the south you see the large gates which lead out into the encampment of the soldiers of the order and to the west is a long hallway.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. A large set of double doors are to the north.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. A set of stairs lead up.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. A set of stairs lead down.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. To the east is a barred obsidian door.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it.

Room.Name: A turn in the hall
Room.Description: The hall here is the same as the rest of the hallways you have seen so far. Hallways go in both the southern direction as well as the eastern direction. You notice your footsteps do not seem to echo as much here. On the western wall you see a strange looking painting.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is very strange indeed. It seems to be of a cloud of ethereal form shifting and swirling in size and color.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. There is a mystical door to the south.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. There is an ethereal-looking door to the south.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. A set of stairs lead up and you see a large grate on the ground.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. A set of stairs lead down.

Room.Name: A long hallway
Room.Description: The hallway is somewhat dark due to the walls being made from obsidian, yet they seem to provide a feeling of calmness. Nothing covers the walls which seem to hum with power. The high ceiling makes your footsteps echo loudly throughout the hall, making you all too aware of the emptiness of it. There is a strong iron door to the west.

Room.Name: An Office
Room.Description: The room is filled with a light smoke that hangs in the air with an almost sickening smell. Papers litter both the floor and the large desk that sits in the center of the room. You notice there is a window that looks out over the entire encampment and also gives a good view of the surrounding areas. The door to the room that leads north has been torn from it's hinges and thrown on the floor.

Room.Name: The Commanding Room
Room.Description: This is the room of the Commander of the soldiers of the Obsidian Order. The floor is littered with plans that have been drawn up and discarded. The center of the room has a scaled down version of much of Orthos, where the encampment of the Obsidian soldiers is the center. There is an office to the south.

Room.Name: A secret room
Room.Description: This room is basically non-descript other than the stairway that leads up and the back of a painting to the east.

Room.Name: Stairway
Room.Description: The stairway continues in both directions. Made of obsidian and humming softly, this stairway is much like the rest of the walls you have seen. The only difference is that the higher you climb, the louder the humming gets.

Room.Name: A landing
Room.Description: The walls here seem to hum louder than the hallways you have been through. You feel almost as if you were floating, weightless and oblivious to the laws of nature. A set of stairs leads down and the small landing continues to the east.

Room.Name: A landing
Room.Description: The walls here seem to hum louder than the hallways you have been through. You feel almost as if you were floating, weightless and oblivious to the laws of nature. A set of stairs leads up and the small landing continues to the west.

Room.Name: A landing
Room.Description: The walls here seem to hum louder than the hallways you have been through. You feel almost as if you were floating, weightless and oblivious to the laws of nature. A set of stairs leads down and the small landing continues to the east.

Room.Name: A landing
Room.Description: The walls here seem to hum louder than the hallways you have been through. You feel almost as if you were floating, weightless and oblivious to the laws of nature. To the east there is a shimmering door while the small landing continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Large Room
Room.Description: As you enter the room you are hit with many sensations; taste, smell, sound, and sight. All overloaded with a blinding flash of mist before you. The room itself doesn't even seem like a room, but more of just space. You don't even feel like you are standing on a floor, just floating in a cloud of swirling colors, smells, and sounds. You cannot pinpoint any definate shape in the room, only the sensations brought about by them.

Room.Name: On a ladder
Room.Description: You are climbing on a ladder through a tunnel. The smooth obsidian walls provide what seems like an easy climb, although you are not sure how. Just above your head is a grate that leads into a hallway of the fortress and below you is a small hallway.

Room.Name: A small hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is much darker than the rest you have seen. Little light is provided by the single torch that hangs on the wall. Cobwebs grow in a few corners and a spider spins it's webbing around a fresh fly. To the east you notice the hallway continues and a ladder leads up from here.

Room.Name: A small hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is much darker than the rest you have seen. Little light is provided by the single torch that hangs on the wall. Cobwebs grow in a few corners and a spider spins it's webbing around a fresh fly. To the west you notice the hallway continues and a ladder leads down from here.

Room.Name: The Dungeon
Room.Description: This room is part of the dungeon of the Fortress. The Obsidian Order places people here who oppose it or get in the way of it's reign of terror. There is a cell door to the north, east, south, and west, as well as a ladder leading up.

Room.Name: A dark cell
Room.Description: This cell neither smells good or looks good. A constant dripping from an unknown source is enough to drive the contained mad. It is also very small and very dark, which makes it difficult to see.

Room.Name: A dark cell
Room.Description: This cell neither smells good or looks good. A constant dripping from an unknown source is enough to drive the contained mad. It is also very small and very dark, which makes it difficult to see.

Room.Name: A dark cell
Room.Description: This cell neither smells good or looks good. A constant dripping from an unknown source is enough to drive the contained mad. It is also very small and very dark, which makes it difficult to see.

Room.Name: A dark cell
Room.Description: This cell neither smells good or looks good. A constant dripping from an unknown source is enough to drive the contained mad. It is also very small and very dark, which makes it difficult to see.

Room.Name: Interrogation Room
Room.Description: This is where the Obsidian Order takes people to get knowledge from. Be it spies or rebel leaders, they are subject to the harsh interrogation of the Obsidian Order. In the center of this room is a large table. There are many types of items used in both torture and interrogation hung on the walls and closed in racks.

Room.Name: The Room of Invasion
Room.Description: This room is primarily used by the troops. Magically opened long ago it serves as a doorway to the many areas of Orthos. To the east you see the Temple of the Gods in Midgaard, to the south you see what appears to be a barbarian's village, and to the west you see the Intersection in Ofcol. Looking up, you notice a peculiar glow radiating from a strange magical path, while looking down you see nothing but shadows.

Room.Name: Room of Magical Regeneration
Room.Description: This room is filled with spiritual and magical sensations, stimulating your mind in many ways making you produce twice the amount of magical energy than usual. Unfortunately, with all the mental activity, your physical wounds seem to take twice as long to heal. Something is scrawled sloppily on one of the walls.

Room.Name: The Mess Hall
Room.Description: Many tables fill this small room, all covered with fresh bowls of soup. This is the mess hall for the soldiers of the Obsidian Order. Although they do not enjoy comfort and pleasure, they need to survive, and thus are required to eat. The smell from the soup wafts your way and you detect many smells you wish you hadn't.

Room.Name: Inside the tent
Room.Description: The tent is filled with objects both strange and deadly in design. Jars of blood litter bookshelves and a few weapons clash together in a corner. There do not seem to be any beds in this room, only a few sheepskin thrown about on the floor. The soldiers must not need the comforts of a soft bed. In times of war one must be at their utmost level of strength.

NPC.name: obsidian soldier
NPC.description: He seems almost robotic in his efficiency. Although not as powerful as his elite brothers and commanders, he shows great skill in fighting and makes sure he represents the strength of the order.
NPC.longDescription: A dark soldier is here, emitting the power and influence of the order.

NPC.name: elite obsidian soldier
NPC.description: The epitomy of the soldiers. He has earned his right to order the other soldiers around. Clad in high obsidian gear, he is not only feared among his soldiers but throughout the land as well. Dark eyes and pale skin make him seem almost devoid of life and his visciousness in combat show him possibly without soul.
NPC.longDescription: An elite soldier of the obsidian order stands here observing the soldiers.

NPC.name: obsidian commander
NPC.description: He is one of the very few who have been chosen by the Founder to lead the obsidian soldiers. After showing his loyalty and power by leading his men to a nearby kingdom and utterly destroying it, he was given this post. Now he spends his time making sure his soldiers are ready for war.
NPC.longDescription: A dark man seated behind a desk sneers at your disrespect for the order.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: founder ethereal being shape
NPC.description: It shifts form and size while glowing with power. The temperature in the room rises, and then falls to what feels like below freezing. Flashing lights are all around you and you cannot focus on any of them. It is the controlling force behind the order and seems to have been angered by your entrance.
NPC.longDescription: An ethereal being shifts shape and form while radiating a strange light.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Undead Mage AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: obsidian jailor guard
NPC.description: He seems not to either enjoy his work nor resent it. His eyes are almost lifeless in their darkness and his pale face seems like it was carved from a large piece of ivory. He has been placed in the lower parts of the large fortress to guard the prisoners and make sure they do not escape.
NPC.longDescription: A tall, dark man stands here, guarding the prisoners of the order.

NPC.name: Silea grey-elf woman
NPC.description: She is very beautiful and looks at you with the deepest sadness. Her piercing violet eyes not only make you feel almost guilty for her capture, but also seem to hope you will let her go free.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful grey-elf woman sits here, wondering why she was captured.

NPC.name: Diron human
NPC.description: He seems completely lost. Wandering around his cell still wondering what went wrong with his life and how he got to be trapped in a cell of the order. Supposedly he is locked here for acting against the Order and fleeing from arrest. The Order obviously was not happy and now he spends his days in a cell.
NPC.longDescription: A tall human is here, pacing around his cell.

NPC.name: La'Shana elf princess
NPC.description: Dirt is smudged on her face and her clothes are torn and shredded like old rags. She was once a princess, serving her people well and helping her father and husband in diplomatic situations. When the Order tried to force the elves to turn their village over completely, they quite obviously refused. When they made that choice, what seemed like thousands of soldiers, human and giants, attacked her village. Her husband is being held somewhere else, but she is unsure of where.
NPC.longDescription: A tired and dirty-looking elf stands quietly here.

NPC.name: gnome warrior
NPC.description: He is one of the strongest gnomes you have ever seen. Muscles ripple all over his 3 foot tall body. He was part of the great gnomish army who risked their lives to fight the order. They were set up. As the army of gnomes came to destroy the soldiers of the Obsidian Order, the Founder itself fought with them. Blasting off 15 gnomes at a time and crushing others under foot, the army was utterly destroyed. Only a handful survived and were considered the luckiest of their army to the Order and have been held captive ever since.
NPC.longDescription: A strong gnome is sitting here, wondering if he'll ever get out.

NPC.name: obsidian guard
NPC.description: He looks strong enough to take out one of the soldiers and keep out any unwanted guests to the fortress. He must hold a rank just above the soldiers yet below that of the elite guards. For now, he guards the door.
NPC.longDescription: A strong looking obsidian guard stands here, guarding the fortress.

NPC.name: cook dark human
NPC.description: He bears a few scars but from the looks of his size, he isn't a soldier.
NPC.longDescription: A pale human stands here, serving food to the soldiers of the order.

NPC.name: troll dark interrogator
NPC.description: He grins at you and points to the various instruments he uses in his work. He drools a bit as he describes his most recent "work" and shows off a few techninques he's created over the years. You notice his muscles are very well toned and the hair on his hair is beginning to grey. He looks to be an experienced fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A dark looking troll, hunched over a table, waits to interrogate someone.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: assistant goblin
NPC.description: Hopefully gaining favor in his volunteer work in the new order, the goblin follows everything the troll says. Not very muscular, he seems even small for a goblin. Pale-green skin and rags that are torn and dirty, he seems only a peasant in this grand obsidian fortress.
NPC.longDescription: A small and disgusting goblin is here, fiddling with the torture devices.

NPC.name: Rasheeka centaur
NPC.description: As leader of the group of centaur warriors known as the Redhawks, Rasheeka has brought her best to help against the Order and the new alliance. She hopes to take out as many soldiers as possible, while making it inside the fortress and destroying it. Perhaps one of the best centaur warriors in the realm, she is confident that she and her warriors will succeed.
NPC.longDescription: Rasheeka, leader of the centaur warriors, stands here quietly.

NPC.name: Rakeesh centaur
NPC.description: Brother to Rasheeka, Rakeesh is second in command of the Redhawks. Having been the wilder one of his family, his sister sometimes has to remind him of his responsibility to her and the others. More in it for the fighting and the kill, Rakeesh is an excellent warrior and looks forward to slaughtering as many soldiers as possible. The muscles that cover his body are all ready for any battle that may come his way.
NPC.longDescription: A large centaur with a wild-looking mane stands here restlessly.

NPC.name: Ralana centaur
NPC.description: Having joined the Redhawks to aid Rasheeka in her battle against the tyrannical Obsidian Order, Ralana uses her skill as a ranger to help track soldiers who have wandered to far from their camp. Biding their time, it seems to her that every second counts against them.
NPC.longDescription: A small, yet determined centaur stands here, eyeing the Tower.

Item.Name: obsidian helm
Item.LongDescription: A dark helm with the insignia of the Obsidian Order is here.

Item.Name: obsidian breastplate plate
Item.LongDescription: A dark breastplate with the insignia of the Obsidian Order is here.

Item.Name: insignia obsidian
Item.LongDescription: A dark insignia of the Obsidian Order is here.

Item.Name: arm armplates obsidian
Item.LongDescription: A dark pair of obsidian armplates are here.

Item.Name: obsidian cape
Item.LongDescription: A dark cape of the Obsidian Order is here.

Item.Name: obsidian boots
Item.LongDescription: A dark pair of obsidian boots are here.

Item.Name: obsidian sword longsword
Item.LongDescription: A dark longsword with the insignia of the Obsidian Order rests here.

Item.Name: helm commander obsidian
Item.LongDescription: A Helm of pure obsidian sits here, showing the power of the Obsidian Order.

Item.Name: fists commander
Item.ShortDescription: the fists of the Obsidian Commander
Item.LongDescription: A bloody pair of fists twitch on the ground here.

Item.Name: sword obsidian
Item.LongDescription: A dark sword of pure obsidian sits here with the fear of the Obsidian Order.

Item.Name: shield obsidian
Item.ShortDescription: the shield of the Obsidian Order
Item.LongDescription: A dark shield of pure obsidian sits here.

Item.Name: bracelet control
Item.LongDescription: A dark bracelet rests here emitting influence and control.

Item.Name: gown ethereal founder
Item.ShortDescription: the Ethereal Gown of the Founder
Item.LongDescription: A mystical gown shifts shape and form on the ground here.

Item.Name: wrath founder
Item.LongDescription: A strange and mystical weapon of intense power rests here.

Item.Name: orb obsidian
Item.ShortDescription: the Orb of the Obsidian Order
Item.LongDescription: A strange and mystical orb floats here, humming loudly.

Item.Name: violet tunic
Item.LongDescription: A beautifully crafted violet tunic is here

Item.Name: flail stone
Item.LongDescription: A large stone flail sits here reminding you of the past.

Item.Name: bracelet emerald
Item.LongDescription: A shiny hoop off emerald glints on the ground here.

Item.Name: bracer gnome
Item.ShortDescription: a bracer of the Gnomish Empire
Item.LongDescription: A powerful looking bracer with the insignia of the gnomish empire is here.

Item.Name: mist barsak platemail
Item.ShortDescription: the platemail of Mist and Mayhem
Item.LongDescription: A strange platemail flickers and flashes on the floor here.

Item.Name: destruction chaos
Item.LongDescription: Order itself rests here in the form of a weapon!

Item.Name: helm skull outlaw
Item.LongDescription: A large skull of an Outlaw rests on the ground here.

Item.Name: cloak interrogation red
Item.LongDescription: A red cloak sits on the ground.

Item.Name: dark leather leggings
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of dark leather leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark leather leggings are here.

Item.Name: platinum hoof plates hoof-plates
Item.LongDescription: A set of platinum hoof-plates are here.

Item.Name: bracelet redhawks red
Item.LongDescription: A red-tinted bracelet is here.

Item.Name: crude fur cloak
Item.LongDescription: A crudely made fur cloak sits in the corner here.

Item.Name: axe great Redhawks
Item.ShortDescription: the Great axe of the Redhawks
Item.LongDescription: A large, beautifully crafted axe sits here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Bless AntiEvil NoRemove Unholy

Item.Name: strong platinum armplates arm plates
Item.LongDescription: A pair of strong-looking platinum armplates are here.

Item.Name: fur-lined fur huge shield Redhawks
Item.ShortDescription: the huge, fur-lined shield of the Redhawks
Item.LongDescription: A huge, fur-lined shield is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: iron plates hoof hoof-plates
Item.LongDescription: A set of iron hoof-plates lies here.

Item.Name: fire camp campfire
Item.LongDescription: A large campfire crackles as it warms the room.

Item.Name: belt woven centaur hair
Item.ShortDescription: a belt of woven centaur hair
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful belt made from woven bits of a centaur's mane sits here.

Item.Name: wood woodsmaster hood
Item.LongDescription: A large, leather hood sits here, stirring the surroundings as if a soft wind is blowing.
